TopicTitle: Mk2 Lightning Cockpit for B9 Aerospace v1.3 (FAR drag fixed)

Articles.Content: There's a lightswitch for the cockpit IVA. I guess you probably mean lit from the outside though...
Yeah, a fix for FAR would be much appreciated, other than that it's fantastic

Yeah, a fix for FAR would be much appreciated, other than that it's fantastic

Fixed it, thanks to ferram. Get v1.2.

There's a lightswitch for the cockpit IVA. I guess you probably mean lit from the outside though...

Yeah. Not that I don't love this (and all of your other work), but all of the regular B9 cockpits have external lights. Love to see yours do that as well.

Just got back into ksp after a massive hearthstone month or two, and this is one of the first mods I see xD

Looks amazing!
How about a version without intakes, fitted for Mk.1 fuselage system? It'd likely not require altering IVA, but could be really handy for smaller fighters.

I have been wanting this look for some time, So glad you made it. It is a bit heavy but can be tuned using drop tanks for weights. Now if we can just get TT to update the VTOL engines

TT engines are tweeked +200 thrush rate to lift craft.
Yeah, I noticed the weight too. The reaction-wheel power is absolutely ridiculous as well.

I adjusted the weight based on its size compared to the original B9 mk2 cockpit, and didn't change reaction wheel power - don't sue me =p.

BlackHoleSun - Looks like you need to update BDArmory! Those flares are old and ugly!
nope-nope... totally misread the torque on the wheel... thought it was set to 20. my bad

True BahamutoD they are the old ones. Just updated to your new set.

Only weight issue is with TT VTOL engines.

BahamutoD Any plans to make a bomb bay setup for MK2?

Edited October 15, 2014 by BlackHoleSun
Maybe it is an idea to warp to daylight next time you make a video, it is a little hard to see

Awesome cockpit, the first one I've used in a successful plane (one that actually made it back in mostly one piece...)

Any plans for an emissive for it??

I love your mods! I know little about the art work, but I hope it's not too much trouble to make a Mk1 cockpit, basically removing the inlets from the current one? If it's not too much trouble, I think it's worth doing, because the existing mk1 cockpits don't look nice
My god, it's beautiful.
Best cockpit for the B9 set. So beautiful and pretty useful with that canopy. Nice work BahamutoD
This is beautiful... I wish it didnt require B9....
Any chance of the craft file please for your example

Thanks everyone! Cockpits are a lot of work so I might not make another one in a while.

Virtualgenius - Get the craft here : http://kerbalx.com/crafts/210
What's with all the B9 hate? If it's too heavy for you remove the parts you don't use, all HX parts are in one folder, the other sizes aren't hard to find either, they're clearly labeled.
Can you make Fighter parts pack in addition to BDA?

Can you make Fighter parts pack in addition to BDA?

I'd hate to stress our beloved BahamutoD out anymore, but there is a severe lack of dedicated fighter parts in KSP...
*cough* *cough* internal weapons bay *cough* *cough*
Kerbals are a peace loving race why would you need weapons for space exploration

Given the amount of explosives of all kinds they make, I doubt the "peace loving" bit. How can you trust a race that blows stuff up just for the heck of it? Weapons are actually an improvement for Kerbals. Many are designed to precisely destroy the target and not much else, which can't be said for, say, an orange fuel tank dropped from a plane...
